message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, especially considering its worth to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you understanding its value to me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I want to make this work for both of us. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
